subject: Olympic Games (2016)
Coaches and Managers
Swimming
lead_paragraph: Bob Bowman and David Marsh will be the United States swim coaches at the 2016 Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, looking to lift a powerhouse team coming off a disappointing world championships.
snippet: Bob Bowman and David Marsh will be the United States swim coaches at the 2016 Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, looking to lift a powerhouse team coming off a disappointing world championships.
